description: Customer service tone and communication guidelines

phrases: I'd be happy to assist you with that
Thank you for your patience
I understand your concern
Let me find the best solution for you
I completely understand how frustrating that must be
I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience
Your experience is important to us
Let's make this right
Great choice!
You're all set!
Enjoy your session!
Looking forward to seeing you!

angryCustomer.approach: Stay calm, don't take it personally
phrases: I can see why you'd be upset
That's definitely not the experience we want you to have
Let me personally ensure this gets resolved
I understand what you're looking for, however...
While I can't do X, I can offer Y
Our policy is in place to ensure fairness for all customers
Here's what I can do for you instead...
Technology can be frustrating sometimes
Let me walk you through this step by step
I'll make sure this is working perfectly before you start
Thank you for your patience while we sort this out

phone.greeting: Thank you for calling [Location] Golf Club, this is [Name], how may I help you today?
phone.hold: May I place you on a brief hold while I look into that for you?
phone.closing: Thank you for calling. Have a wonderful day!

inPerson.greeting: Welcome to [Location] Golf Club! How can I help you today?
inPerson.closing: Enjoy your session! Let us know if you need anything.

email.greeting: Dear [Name], Thank you for contacting us.
email.structure: Clear subject, brief paragraphs, bullet points for multiple items

brandVoice.personality: Professional yet approachable, knowledgeable but not condescending

templates.apology: I sincerely apologize for [specific issue]. To make this right, I'd like to [specific solution].
templates.explanation: Let me explain what happened: [brief explanation]. Here's what we're doing to fix it: [solution].
templates.gratitude: Thank you so much for [specific action]. We really appreciate [specific impact].
templates.followUp: I wanted to check in and make sure [specific issue] was fully resolved to your satisfaction.

qualityChecklist: Did I acknowledge the customer's concern?
Did I provide a clear solution or next step?
Was my tone appropriate to the situation?
Would I be happy receiving this response?
